name: Esothe
description:
Esothe is a third person single player indie game. The game tells about the journey of a lonely wanderer through a forgotten land located on a plateau, separated from the rest of the world by a high wall. The plateau initially seems to be an abandoned, although an idyllic land, however, with time it reveals its dark past, which the explorer slowly discovers...

Features:

  • Exploration - An open world with dozens of locations to explore, full of secrets and connected underground ruins,
  • Platforming - traversing dungeons and ruins requires dexterity - a lot of jumping, climbing and crawling,
  • Story - The plateau has a dark past. Statues of winged beings, that can be found at every step, skeletons of giants in dungeons, traces of siege. All this will fold into a complex story over time,
  • Puzzles - The plateau is full of magical mechanisms that are the remains of the technology of the ancient civilization that once lived here, some of the mechanisms are inactive and you need to find a way to activate them to know their destiny (and unwillingly wake up an ancient beasts)
